name: License Generator
short_description: Generates a license that is used to enable the use of certain products. Fully customizable, easy to implement.
long_description: A concrete example can be found with the Extend cBot

params.title: License Generator x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Product
params.content: The name of product, e.g. Trend Master

params.title: Password
params.content: Must match the password entered in your product

params.title: Expire (*|2022.12.31 00:00:00)
params.content: The expiration of the license, if you enter the asterisk (*) then it will be lifetime, otherwise follow the proposed example to indicate the exact date

params.title: Allow Backtest?
params.content: In some cases you may need to prevent backtesting or optimization, with this parameter you can control it
